attributes.action: Subject himself and the Honourable Members of Parliament to the police investigation for defrauding the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the citizens of this country believe that our representatives in the House of Commons have committed fraud by wilfully claiming allowances on possessions that were not been incurred in the conduct of their duties. As such, we insist that their activities are referred to the Metropolitan Police for investigation, and where appropriate, criminal charges brought. 

Honourable members should not be sheltered from the law by the political system nor be dealt with singularly through the internal mechanisms of Parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
